item.title: What Are the Benefits of Linux?
item.description: What Exactly is Linux? Linux is a UNIX-like operating system which is completely free, open source and community supported. Linux is the most popular open source operating system that is the foundation of most of the Internet. Linux powers most of the web. Linux powers the servers that provide the infrastructure to the entire Internet. Linux powers the mobile phones and tablets. The linux operating system was created in 1991 by Linus Torvalds.
